name: emi.dpm
description:
Storage Element with SRM interface using MySQL as database backend.

and

Disk server for a Disk Pool Manager (DPM) Storage Element (SE).
releaseNotes:
What's new

    Added thread safe CSEC_MECH

    Packaging is now Fedora compliant

    Added synchronous dpm_get support

    Added support for MySQL 5.5 for the db creation script

    SRMv1 is now disabled by default

    Added sample my.cnf configuration file

    New HTTP/DAV frontend daemon



Affected services

    DPM, UI, WN



Deployment Notes:

    Standard procedure:

        metapackage update

        yaim reconfiguration

    Detailed information at DPM/LFC v.1.8.3-1



Known issues:

    #505: dpm and dpnsdaemon abort / core dump:

        This issue is understood and will affect all installations. Please apply the follow procedure after upgrade / installation:



# vim /etc/sysconfig/dpm

...

export GLOBUS_THREAD_MODEL="pthread"

# vim /etc/sysconfig/dpnsdaemon

...

export GLOBUS_THREAD_MODEL="pthread"

# service dpm restart

# service dpnsdaemon restart
